file_content.text: Commander Ollien. I am here on Darth Baras's order. Bring me up to speed.
Not a minute too soon. All indications are that the enemy has been ready to strike for some time.
If my reports are correct, they have us dead to rights. I'm thankful they've hesitated this long.
They'll regret not seizing the opportunity.
A fatal mistake.
They may yet if we don't hurry.
I need all the details.
Well, I'll be sure to thank them for you.
You're grateful to them?
Uh, right, no need, my lord. Just a figure of speech.
An elite Republic task force has found a cavern that tunnels beneath this command center.
They've set explosives that will destroy the center and disrupt all Imperial military operations and communications on the planet.
Tell me where to go and I will end this threat.
Just point me to them.
Only a fool sits and waits for death.
Why haven't you acted?
My hands are tied, my lord. Operations here cannot be moved nor abandoned, and all my forces are engaged on the front.
I'd say someone ought to stop them.
Gee, sounds bad.
My... thoughts exactly, my lord.
I sent what soldiers I had to search for the cavern, but the survivors returned with blaster burns for their efforts.
Here are rough coordinates of our best guess. Good luck.
